name: Friday Night Funkin VS. Hex full week optimized (KADE ENGINE)
name_original: Friday Night Funkin VS. Hex full week optimized (KADE ENGINE)
description:
Hex mod optimized for Chromebooks.

mod: https://gamebanana.com/gamefiles/14942

Dunk replaces Bopeebo, then the rest of the songs are in order in week 2.

changelog:

FIXED LOADING LMAO

known issues:

Glitcher has no cool changing background because I couldn't figure out how to do that.

BF and GF don't have glow around them because the web version is not coded to handle multiple BF and GF files.
